dcterms:creator: Mathias Gehrig
Adarsh Kumar Kosta
Kaushik Roy
dcterms:description: The DSEC-Flow dataset consists of optical flow ground truths for 24 driving sequences, providing a total of 7800 training samples and 2100 test samples, specifically designed for evaluating optical flow estimation methods.
dcterms:title: DSEC-flow

dcterms:creator: Alex Zihao Zhu
Kenneth Chaney
Kostas Daniilidis
dcterms:description: The MVSEC dataset comprises various indoor and outdoor sequences captured using stereo event cameras, designed for 3D perception and optical flow estimation tasks.
dcterms:title: Multi-Vehicle Stereo Event-Camera (MVSEC)
